entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as the one who pointed at a large clump of white berries and warned Harry about nargles. She said it 'often infested with nargles'.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who was under the mistletoe and was saved by Luna's warning. He also reacted to Angelina's news about being replaced.

entities.name: angelina
entities.description: Angelina is mentioned as the one who arrived with Katie and Alicia, and told Harry that he had been replaced as a Seeker by Ginny Weasley.

entities.name: katie
entities.description: Katie is mentioned as the one who confirmed Angelina's news about Harry being replaced by Ginny Weasley.

entities.name: alicia
entities.description: Alicia is mentioned as the one who arrived with Angelina and Katie.

entities.name: ginny weasley
entities.description: Ginny Weasley is mentioned as the new Seeker, replacing Harry.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as one of the people who was replaced by Ginny Weasley.

entities.name: george
entities.description: George is mentioned as one of the people who was replaced by Ginny Weasley.

relationships.description: Luna warned Harry about nargles under the mistletoe.
Angelina arrived with Katie and Alicia.
Ginny Weasley replaced Harry as a Seeker.
